name: More than meets the eye version 0.0.2
name_original: More than meets the eye version 0.0.2
description:
More than meet the eyes it is a visual novel about the adventure of a guy and two girls.  It seems like a peaceful funny life but it is everything really what it seems at first?

This is an update to the original game so i will delete the original post because this has both versions.

-Added almost 3 000 words

-Fixed some grammar errors

-Introduced a new character
